description: 23 km of cross country ski trails used during the summer for mountain biking and horse back riding. Excellent views of Lakelse Lake and  the valley from viewpoints along the Moose Highway trail. The site is maintained and managed by the  Snow Valley Nordic Ski Club.   See the detailed trail maps  of the extensive skiing trails here.
directions: The trailhead is located 29 km north of Kitimat where the Wedeene Forest Service Road meets Highway 37.For more information Email:info@snowvalleynordics.comor write to:Snow Valley Nordic Ski ClubPO Box 404, Kitimat, B.C.V8C 2M4After skiing the   Mount Layton Hot Springs     is a must to visit for a great soak in the pools, dinner and  an  overnight stay at the hotel.
title: Onion Lake Ski Trails
